Sequence Information.Source: Virulence factor of aquatic pathogenic fungus Aphanomyces invadans
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: Rat skeletal myoblast cell line (L6):91.73 ± 2% viability = 10 µM; 90.65 ± 2.9% viability = 20 µM; 87.91 ± 3.05% viability = 30 µM; 87.29 ± 1.9% viability = 40 µM; 84.44 ± 3.8% viability = 50 µM
Sequence Information.Comments: GE18 affects the cellular morphology, which triggers the cells to undergo apoptosis for biological cellular elimination

Literature.Title: Aquatic Peptide The Potential Anti-Cancer and Anti-Microbial Activity of GE18 Derived from Pathogenic Fungus Aphanomyces invadans
Literature.Author: Velayutham M, Priya PS, Sarkar P, Murugan R, Almutairi BO, Arokiyaraj S, Kari ZA, Tellez-Isaias G, Guru A, Arockiaraj J.
